description: Indicates that this issue / PR needs to be discussed in detail before further steps can be taken
name: discussion

description: Indicates that a similar / identical issue already exists
name: duplicate

description: Indicates that this issue needs a reproduction before further steps can be taken
name: needs repro

description: Indicates an automated dependency update by renovate
name: renovate

description: Indicates a request for help / clarification
name: support

description: Indicates an unintended behaviour, unexpected problem, crash
name: type: bug

description: Indicates an issue that only occurs on specific browsers / operating systems / devices
name: type: compatibility

description: Indicates wrong, unclear, missing or hard to understand documentation
name: type: documentation

description: Indicates that work won't continue based on a previous decision / discussion
name: wontfix
